channel.title: CVE Feed for Badge.team -- Hacker Hotel Badge 2024
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Badge.team -- Hacker Hotel Badge 2024

item.title: CVE-2024-21875|2024-07-05T17:20:50.700Z -- badge.team -- hacker%20hotel%20badge%202024
item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in Badge leading to a denial of service attack.Team Hacker Hotel Badge 2024 on risc-v (billboard modules) allows Flooding.This issue affects Hacker Hotel Badge 2024: from 0.1.0 through 0.1.3.

item.description: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling vulnerability in Badge leading to a denial of service attack.Team Hacker Hotel Badge 2024 on risc-v (billboard modules) allows Flooding.This issue affects Hacker Hotel Badge 2024: from 0.1.0 through 0.1.3.
